Name: MeiQi 2020
About the game: MeiQi Series Introduction MeiQi is a plot-oriented puzzle game set in the 1990s in China, where players will take on the role of the police detective 'Liu Youth' as the core force of justice, solving cases and defeating various evil organizations. The game consists of a number of independent cases, which together create a very rich story. By the end of summer 2022, there have been nine consecutive seasons, each season consists of six separate games (DLC). Each episode has an approximate play time of one hour. The original game was developed using the Unity engine and debuted on the AppStore, and this collection will be based on the original game using the Unreal5 engine. You will get a better visual experience as well as control experience on the PC platform. Sun Miki Suspicion 2020 Sun Miki Suspense 2020 is a collection of the 2020 releases of the Sun Miki Suspense series It contains the complete second/third/fourth/fifth seasons, as well as a special episode. Specifically includes Season 2 S02E01:ZhuXiaoKun S02E02:ZhouJing S02E03:ZhangHongjun S02E04:Suidatong S02E05:Xiaxiaomei S02E06:LiuQingchun Season 3 S03E01:LangMingqi S03E02:JinFenghuang S03E03:ZhouFang S03E04:SongMingChao S03E05:YingXueer S03E06:LangWei Season 4 S03E01:WangYong S04E02:LanZhi S04E03:ChenTingjun S04E04:Haduo S04E05:AjiaTa S04E06:FengYuejin Fifth Season S05E01:Dieer S05E02:DengQiuping S05E03:YuRenren S05E04:ChenShuangShi S05E05:ZongDaBao S05E06:NanHe Special Episode Captivity Game Features Rich scenery and 1990s local nostalgic style Each individual case takes place in a unique location, with carefully designed scenery and objects. 90's China is familiar and unfamiliar, and you'll feel especially close to it. As the cases continue, you will be treated to a complete look at China in the 80's and 90's. They will include: homes and lodges, temples and ancient buildings, public spaces, transportation, and any location you have ever thought of. Separate but continuous episodes and continuous updates Each case is a stand-alone game that can be played in any order, and you can enter the Sunmatch universe from any case (DLC), and the exciting plot will be continuously updated, and you can get the latest information (trailers and new clues) through Steam or other media! The core gameplay of scene exploration, puzzle solving, and deduction correlation Carefully designed scenes with a series of objects furnished, organs, puzzles, you can search for evidence in the process to understand the plot, reasoning and correlation is the core gameplay of the Sun Miki suspect case, as a detective, you must master the skills of reasoning! About me Yes, all the development work is done by me independently, please tolerate some flaws, if possible Sun Miki detective universe will always be updated.
